articles.title: The Lakewood fire has now burned over 160 acres of land
articles.description: A large brush fire in Lakewood, New Jersey, that began Sunday afternoon has so far burned over 160 acres of land and damaged at least 29 homes, officials said.

articles.title: Brown on why it's fair to ask why Biden hasn't held a press conference
articles.description: The White House has yet to put a solo news conference by President Joe Biden on his calendar, making him unique among the four most recent presidents, who all held solo press conferences during their first 50 days in office.
